name: TonguesOut
description:
Hello fellow video game enthusiasts,

for this Minijam with the theme "frogs" we decided to do a survival game, where you have to feed on the insects of the swamp. If it weren't for those pesky hunters not giving you enough time to aim your tongue!

This game can be played in the Browser!

Big thanks to Andi for the graphics, DocHoc for the music and all the people that helped testing it!
